post.author: Paveway
post.body:
Do anyone know of good cloth/fabric textures? For as long as doom 3 has been out, I would think that at least one person might have a good fabric/cloth or carpet texture. I really am trying to do some living-area type stuff but there are no good textures to use for couches or beds etc. I just need a simple cloth texture.

Has anyone run across one? Thanks!
